title: MFL-3 Style Contemporary Floor Lamp Black
body: Serge Mouille wanted every piece of lighting to be personal, beautiful and extravagant thus, he ended-up with was a fully-customizable lamp that could be molded and shaped by whoever used it to create extraordinary lighting effects, from bright light to understated warmth. The MFL-3 Style Contemporary Floor Lamp was one of the 20th Century's most eccentric and colorful designers ripping-up the lighting design rulebook. Serge Mouille inspired the design of this contemporary lamp to create an object of modern lighting being at the same time practical.
